::Koj::
Koj finding his half of the list very easy "Done"

::Inu::
"Ditto" Stares at the Dollies full of supplies.

::Koj::
"Let�s move out." Koj attaches one of his cloaks to the dollies.

::Inu::
Inu uses his breath on his a low level to Fuse the Dollies together making a 
bigger Transport craft. Inu closes the storage unit door as they head back 
to Koj layer.

::Koj::
"We need to move this stuff back to the ark and fast." Koj attaches some 
booster to the super dolly.

::Inu::
Enters Neo mode and grabs his half and fires off his thrusters.

::Koj::
Koj doing the same

::Both take of toward the ark.::
